title: Did the Red Hot Chili Peppers break up? - Quora

response.answer_text: As of 2020, they are still going. I remember reading that they did nearly break up a few times. And, they have had many personnel changes. But, in 2020 they’ll probably be playing shows with the group’s most famous lineup: Anthony Kiedis, Flea, Chad Smith and John Frusciante, who makes his return after a 10-year absence.
